definition: devour raw meat and fowl (of savages)
to eat/(extended meaning) to endure/putrid smell/vegetables/roots (inextricably attached to the plant)

hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])

sentences.english: Science has brought mankind from a primitive form of life to the present high-tech age.
sentences.chinese: 科学把人类从茹毛饮血带入现在的高科技时代。

sentences.english: Don't tell me that eating raw meat like a primitive person is the best way to be.
sentences.chinese: 天人合一，难道生活在茹毛饮血的原始时代才是最好？

definition: to drill wood to make fire
fishing and hunting/fig. to loot/to plunder
to live in a cave/(of animals) to be of burrowing habit
slave-owning society (precedes feudal society 封建社會|封建社会 in Marxist theory)
nomadic/to move about in search of pasture/to rove around as a nomad
man-eating (beast)/to eat people/fig. to oppress the people
